h1_title: How to Open the Purple Seal Prison Doors in the Pagoda Realm
h2_title: How to Remove the Purple Magic Seals on the Prison Cells in Chapter 3
content: Go up the stairs and as you exit the cell, you’ll see that the path branches off to the left and right. Take the path on the right, going back on yourself, until you reach the wooden beam. Use this as a bride to reach the smaller ledge (watch out for the archer on the way).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Open_the_Purple_Seal_Prison_Doors_in_the_Pagoda_Realm.md', within the main section titled 'How to Open the Purple Seal Prison Doors in the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'How to Remove the Purple Magic Seals on the Prison Cells in Chapter 3'.
The content is as follows:
Go up the stairs and as you exit the cell, you’ll see that the path branches off to the left and right. Take the path on the right, going back on yourself, until you reach the wooden beam. Use this as a bride to reach the smaller ledge (watch out for the archer on the way).
